snippet: Kyrgyzstan’s security agency said it had stopped a plot by Islamist radicals to disrupt the presidential election on Oct. 30 and sow chaos in the country’s volatile southern region.
lead_paragraph: Kyrgyzstan’s security agency said it had stopped a plot by Islamist radicals to disrupt the presidential election on Oct. 30 and sow chaos in the country’s volatile southern region.

headline.main: Kyrgyzstan: Plot by Islamists Is Said to Have Been Disrupted
headline.print_headline: Kyrgyzstan: Plot by Islamists Is Said to Have Been Disrupted
headline.seo: In Kyrgyzstan, Plot by Islamists Is Said to Have Been Disrupted
